trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around March 3rd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my work truck out at Tucson airport driving south toward my destination (a building on the property) when I glanced out my driver side window at a jet flying south. A bright, white, pulsating, shape changing object appeared several miles behind the jet. I stopped my truck to be safe and I was soon joined by a company employee who was in a golf cart turning north in front of me. She stopped and asked me what I was looking at and I pointed and showed her. She responded WTF is that and I said I do not Know. The object never changed its position and disappeared after a minute or so. (It's amazing how long a minute can seem) If I was looking east standing straight and I pointed to the object with my right hand, it would be at the 2 O'clock position. Using the surounding mountains as reference I would estimate that the object was around 10,000 ft in altitude. This would put it over the town of Sahuarita. The airport altitude is aproximately 2300 ft. I did not think to use my phone camera until too late. I hope some other folks saw this. This my first day time sighting and I am pretty exited about it. I believe the other witness is too. Thanks for this forum, Dave
